actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-325.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 368 - 42 (Record Vote No: 340).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2310) to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 for the purpose of extending the authorization of appropriations for airport and airway improvements, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2310 (airport development).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2310) to amend the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 for the purpose of extending the authorization of appropriations for airport and airway improvements, and for other purposes.
